intro: Solve the tricky puzzles to earn Bitnuts and repair the little robot
description:
Box Chaos – the ultimate 3D puzzle adventure awaits!

Take control of a cute, rusty little robot as you tackle a variety of physics-based challenges and solve tricky box-pushing puzzles. In Box Chaos, your wits and skills will be put to the test in creative, mind-bending ways!

Push, shove, and strategize!
Each level challenges you to move boxes to their matching colored targets. But be careful—hazards like spikes, fire traps, and exploding barrels stand in your way. Sometimes, you'll need to knock boxes down from high platforms or follow a specific sequence—mess up, and you'll be starting from scratch!

Physics meets creativity!
Use realistic physics mechanics to discover clever solutions and navigate each level. Every decision matters, and success often lies in finding the right strategy.

Customize your robot!
Your little robot starts off covered in rust, but with each puzzle you solve, you earn BitNuts, the in-game currency. Visit the lab to clean off the rust, unlock new skins, or change your robot's eye color. Personalize your robot to make it truly yours!

Unique music experience
Relax as you solve puzzles to the tune of over 50 carefully curated tracks playing in the background. With the built-in music player, you can adjust the volume or skip tracks—it's your personalized soundtrack for every adventure.

Can you master the chaos?
Each level introduces new, challenging puzzles and mechanics that keep you on your toes. Can you bring all the boxes to their destinations and fully restore your robot?

Dive into the world of Box Chaos, where strategy, physics, and fun collide!

Are you ready for the challenge?
